column4: ive heard of vmware is that a free application? I'm looking for something similiar to vmware or if someone can give me more information on vmware so i can try to run windows inside linux.
VMware player and server are free (however, not opensource)...there are indeed loads of programs out there to have virtual machines
some do a better job with windows, some little less good...:)....I personally know that vmware (server) works very good
however, your linux or other windows virtual machines are not affected
but it shouldnt get to bad if i just pop it on for a quick use of an app and then back off right?
